channel.title: Clay County Ideas & Deals
channel.description: Recommended safety gear and winter apparel.

item.title: Emergency Glow Sticks
item.description: 12 Hours Duration, Individually Wrapped Industrial Grade Glowsticks for Survival Gear, Camping Lights, and Power Outages.

item.title: Yaktrax Spikes for Walking on Ice and Snow
item.description: Compact, lightweight spiked traction cleats for light walking on slippery surfaces; ideal for navigating icy sidewalks and driveways.

item.title: Emergency Anti-Snow Chains
item.description: Reusable Heavy Duty Tire Traction Ties for Snow & Mud. Portable Anti-Skid Solution for SUV, Pickup Truck, or Car.

item.title: MAGCOMSEN Men's Sherpa Lined Pullover
item.description: Heavyweight sherpa lined sweatshirts to keep you warm in cold weather.

item.title: Wrangler Men's Fleece Lined Carpenter Pants
item.description: Lined with warm fleece that won’t add bulk—perfect for cold-weather work.

item.title: Portable Jump Starter
item.description: Don't get stranded. Jump-start your car solo in seconds.

item.title: Emergency Blankets (4-Pack)
item.description: Space-age Mylar reflects 90% of body heat. Keep these in your glovebox.

item.title: Winter Roadside Kit
item.description: A complete kit including a folding shovel, tow rope, and flashlight.

item.title: NexiEpoch Fleece Lined Leggings
item.description: Thermal thick winter warm high waisted soft pants for snow cold.
